name: Fobia
overview: A beautiful but challenging game about fears, phobias and overcoming them. A little girl tries to escape from her fears overcoming various obstacles in her path. Fobia is a hard puzzle-platformer adventure game, where you will have an adventure in a mysterious world full of dangerous situations, enemies and challenging puzzles. Anything in the game can kill you. Everything is not what it seems. Features: – A beautiful world where a misstep means death. – Unique and peculiar hand drawn 2D Art-Style and 2D animation. – A big variety of puzzles designed with different levels of difficulty. – Atmospheric sound design. – Two different endings.
